inclusion.criterion: participate in the trial, signing an informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: elective and emergent cardiac surgery with cardiopulmonary bypass and aortic cross clamp
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients receiving contrast agents 72 hours before surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient A is a 30-year-old male who was admitted to the hospital after 10 days of cough, profuse nocturnal sweating and loss of appetite. He had traveled to India 1 months ago and has not any positive history of TB vaccination.
